post.title: Shaking Off The Ice
post.content: I got a couple of emails yesterday at my work address that my blog was down. Turns out there’s this big winter storm battering the east coast. My blog is hosted on the east coast and they lost power for a while. No power == no blog. But if you’re reading this, you’ve probably already figured out that the power is back on and my blog is back up.
